sourcesContent:
import React,{ useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { Table,Checkbox,Button} from 'semantic-ui-react'; import '../App.css' const ShowRequest=(props)=> { const[cAddress,setCaddress]=useState(null) const[description,setDes]=useState(null) const[amount,setAmount]=useState(null) const[recipient,setRecp]=useState(null) const[donors,setDonors]=useState(null) const[voters,setVoters]=useState(null) const[completed,setCom]=useState(null) var reNO=0; const requestTemplate={reqNo:"",cAddress:"",description:"",amount:"",recipient:"",donors:"",voters:"",completed:""} const [Requests,setRequests]=useState([]) const requestInfo=async()=>{ const info = await props.contract.methods.getRequeststatus(reNO).call(); setCaddress(info[6]) setDes(info[5]) setAmount(props.web3.utils.fromWei(info[1])) setCom(info[0]) setVoters(info[3]) setDonors(info[4]) setRecp(info[2]) setRequests([info]) setRequests([...Requests,requestTemplate]) } useEffect(()=>{ requestInfo(); console.log("initial reno",reNO) reNO++; console.log("after reno",reNO) },[props.refresh]) return (
Request_NO Creator Description: Amount: Recipient: Voters/Donors Payment Completed {Requests.map((request,index) => ( {request.index} {request.cAddress} {request.description} {request.amount} {request.recipient} {request.voters}/{request.donors} {request.completed} ) )}
) } export default ShowRequest
